name: 3D Platformer (JayWoodo)
description:
Find the coins, reach escape. Stay safe!

Little Ruby spends his days exploring the floating islands - they contain precious coins that Ruby hungers for,  HE MUST HAVE THEM. The floating islands hold powerful gems that augment a person, if but for a moment of invigoration. The path ahead is treacherous and features obstacles that Ruby must manoeuvre through. 

Ruby travels through portals and one is rumoured to be found guarded in a monument at the end of the path. Find a way to access it so Ruby can explore more worlds with more COINS!!!
